about_the_game:
Wishlist GRIMWHIMSY to get news about the game.





You and your friends are convicted criminals thrown into the dark and dangerous corridors of a godforsaken laboratory. Your task is to survive and find out what happened in these creepy places.


Stay alert, as every step could be your last. Use light and shadows to trick the monsters and make your way through.


Make each game unique. Gather resources, repair equipment, and avoid traps. Communicate with your friends through text and voice chat, strategize, and help each other survive.


Allows you to earn points for encounters with monsters and completing missions. These points can be exchanged at the flying mailbox for valuable items that will help you survive.



  • While you were healing, a monster ate your friend? A great reason to report to the government and earn points!
  • Your friend took your loot? Don't worry, you can always zap them with a stun gun or feed them to the monsters.

This is a game about fear, survival, and laughter when everything goes wrong.
Can you survive and uncover all the secrets of the abandoned laboratories? Find out for yourself, but don't forget your friend – who else will distract the monsters?!

That's what friends are for, right? Well, at least that's how it works in our laboratory!

content_descriptors.notes: In our game, Grimwhimsy, players encounter depictions of violence such as combat with monsters involving blunt force impacts, explosions, and bites. While there is no explicit nudity or sexual content, monsters are depicted without genitalia or any discernible gender. The game includes elements of blood and violence typical of a survival horror setting. There are no depictions of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, or self-harm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 или AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti 6GB GDDR5 или AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB GDDR5
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: not yet.
  • Additional Notes: Please note that the game is still in development, and we will optimize it.

short_description: In GrimWhimsy, you and your friends are convicted criminals thrown into the dark corridors of a forgotten laboratory. Survive, trick the monsters, and laugh together when things go wrong. Can you escape this hell? Find out for yourself!
